alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of New Underwood, or 24 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Owanka around 640 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 79 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
